summary.span: Provides a to convert objects to and from other representations.

span.span: Provides a to convert objects to and from other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多數情況下，類型轉換器用來將轉換與當地語系化及其對應的執行個體表示相互轉換。Most commonly, the type converter is used to convert instances to and from their corresponding localized representations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別進行轉換至。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to convert a to a . 這個範例假設您有名為`TextBox1`上名為`Form1`。This example assumes that you have a named `TextBox1` on a named `Form1`. [!code-csharp[SystemWindowsFormsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemWindowsFormsKeys/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWindowsFormsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemWindowsFormsKeys/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是預設值，編譯器提供的建構函式類別。This is the default, compiler-supplied constructor for the class. 一般而言，您無法直接建立的執行個體。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of a . 請改為呼叫方法類別。Instead, call the method of class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.
